title: PEM Parser
description: Parse PEM format certificates, keys, and other data
aboutDesc: PEM (Privacy Enhanced Mail) is a commonly used file format for storing cryptographic keys, certificates, and other security-related data. PEM files are Base64 encoded and enclosed between "-----BEGIN xxx-----" and "-----END xxx-----" markers. Common types include: CERTIFICATE, PRIVATE KEY, PUBLIC KEY, RSA PRIVATE KEY, etc.
